DOC.brief_summary: The investigator contact 64 patient atopic dermatitis ( AD ) participate long-term tacrolimus ointment trial Helsinki 10 year ago , ask participate follow-up study . The investigator test 10 year ago , i.e . bronchial hyperreactivity , skin prick test , serum-IgE , Mantoux-test ( 2 TU ) , questionnaires asthma allergic rhinitis symptom . The investigator also collect data AD medication last 10 year . The investigator hypothesis skin condition improve patient AD brochial hyperreactivity improve . The investigator also want study whether different treatment play role development resolution bronchial hyperreactivity .
DOC.brief_title: Bronchial Hyperreactivity Atopic Dermatitis Patients - 10 Year Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: We letter telephone contact patient ( n=64 ) fulfill inclusion criterion study . The test study ( bronchial hyperreactivity , skin prick testing , serum IgE ) cross-sectional , retrospectively collect data last 10 year skin condition medication atopic disease .
DOC.criteria: Patient participate FG5060621 study Helsinki Patient test bronchial hyperreactivity year 19982000 Patient give sign informed consent participate study
